# resume()

**Instance Method**

Resumes audio playback.

## Declaration

```swift
func resume() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when playback is resumed, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when playback is in progress or when an error occurred.

## Discussion

Assumes the receiver has been previously paused by sending it [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSound].

## Playing Sounds

- **beep()**: Plays the system beep.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean that indicates whether the sound is playing its audio data.
- **pause()**: Pauses audio playback.
- **play()**: Initiates audio playback.
- **stop()**: Concludes audio playback.

items.description: A Boolean that indicates whether the sound is playing its audio data.
